title: Mailbox Monitor Agent
description: Implement a background service (MailboxMonitorAgent) to scan shared mailbox JSON files, acquire locks, and convert messages into tasks in the master task lists automatically.
benefits: Automated ingestion of mailbox messages into tasks
Eliminates redundant polling code in individual agents
Improves consistency and reduces message loss
tasks: Integrate file_lock_manager for safe mailbox access
Update TaskNexus to accept mailbox-derived tasks
Write unit and integration tests for mailbox processing
